title: Greeter
description:
Houston 's Kirby is currently seeking Greeter candidates to join our successful team.

Energy, poise, and an elevated sense of personal style are important.

Upscale restaurant experience can be a plus, but these roles are open to candidates from all backgrounds.

Compensation begins at approximately $14-$18/hr commensurate with experience.

  • Medical/dental benefits are available after an introductory period.
  • Part-time and full-time positions available. Some weekend availability is required. We cannot offer short-term seasonal positions at this time. 

To learn more, visit us at www.hillstone.com, or read this profile in Bon Appetit magazine: http://www.hillstone.com/press/bonappetit

We look forward to meeting you soon!
